text.autoconfig.krlo.title: Kle's Render Layer Optimizer
text.autoconfig.krlo.option.masterToggle: Removes configured rendering layers to increase performance when rendering items, armor, weapons, etc.
text.autoconfig.krlo.option.categories.i: fishing rod, books, tools (flint & steel, carrot on a stick, brush, compass, shears, etc.)
text.autoconfig.krlo.option.categories.w: swords, tridents, bows, crossbows, axes, maces, spears, and shields.
text.autoconfig.krlo.option.categories.o: all items that fall outside these categories (i.e. modded items, custom enchanted items like strength 5 dirt)
